title: Some problems and app hangs
text: Suddenly app become fix and not working in last update

title: Kept leaking my public information
text: This company never saved my public profile updates. I kept it as NO PAST EXPENSES AND DETAILS on my public profile, but when I inspected the update with another account, I could still see all the information. Why is it still showing details even though I update the Public Profile settings???????? This app needs to take personal information seriously. Scammer all over the platform as well. All the third-party head hunters not living in the USA would never actually land you an offer.

title: Job market
text: We love the famous linkedin platform but sometimes it feels like there are no real jobs on here only scammers

title: Just need
text: A ‘mark all read’ button to mark read all the notifications. Rest is on point!

title: Lagging
text:
Love Linkedin except for the fact that after 5 minutes of scrolling on the app it crashes and starts closing the app completely or will not reload the screen. 
Lags forever and I just don’t want to use the app anymore because it 
Hate to leave the review here but couldn’t find where I could report an issue of some sort and get a response back.
